name: Program names should not be empty or null
fullName: features/data_integrity.feature:Program names should not be empty or null
description:
As a TV scheduling system administrator
I want to ensure that all programs in the programs table have corresponding entries in the program_intervals table
So that I can maintain data consistency and completeness across the system
descriptionHtml:
As a TV scheduling system administrator
I want to ensure that all programs in the programs table have corresponding entries in the program_intervals table
So that I can maintain data consistency and completeness across the system
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Found programs with empty names: Program with empty name: start=22:00:00, end=00:00:00
assert 1 == 0
 +  where 1 = len(['Program with empty name: start=22:00:00, end=00:00:00'])
statusTrace:
/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.11.13/x64/lib/python3.11/site-packages/_pytest/fixtures.py:930: in call_fixture_func
    fixture_result = fixturefunc(**kwargs)
                     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
test_data_integrity.py:282: in verify_program_names_not_empty
    assert len(empty_names) == 0, f"Found programs with empty names: {'; '.join(empty_names)}"
E   AssertionError: Found programs with empty names: Program with empty name: start=22:00:00, end=00:00:00
E   assert 1 == 0
E    +  where 1 = len(['Program with empty name: start=22:00:00, end=00:00:00'])

steps.name: And I load the full day programming schedule from CSV file "full_day_programs.csv"
